scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Crucifixion of Christ, with Jesus on the cross, wearing a crown of thorns. To the left, a group of mourners, including the Virgin Mary in a black veil, stand with hands clasped in prayer. To the right, a bearded man in a dark robe and hat gestures towards the cross, holding a scroll. In the background, a cityscape with towers and walls is visible, suggesting Jerusalem. The sky above is dark with celestial bodies, including a sun and moon, and a decorative border frames the scene.
